name: GitHub
description: GitHub API integration for querying repository data and events.

list_commits.description: List commits for a repository within a time range

since.description: ISO 8601 timestamp to filter commits after this date

until.description: ISO 8601 timestamp to filter commits before this date

list_pull_requests.description: List pull requests for a repository with various filters

state.description: State of pull requests to return (open, closed, or all)

get_repository.description: Get detailed information about a repository

list_issues.description: List issues for a repository with various filters

state.description: State of issues to return (open, closed, all)

since.description: ISO 8601 timestamp to filter issues updated after this date

closed_at.description: The timestamp when the issue was closed, or null if not closed

create_issue.description: Create a new issue in a repository

assignees.description: Logins of users to assign to this issue

labels.description: Labels to associate with this issue

milestone.description: Milestone to associate with this issue

update_issue.description: Update an existing issue in a repository

body.description: New body content of the issue

state.description: State of the issue (open or closed)

assignees.description: Logins of users to assign to this issue

labels.description: Labels to associate with this issue

milestone.description: Milestone to associate with this issue

issue_number.description: Issue number to get comments for

get_pull_request.description: Get detailed information about a specific pull request

number.description: Number uniquely identifying the pull request within its repository.

title.description: The title of the pull request.

body.description: The body text of the pull request.

state.description: State of this Pull Request. Either `open` or `closed`.

draft.description: Indicates whether or not the pull request is a draft.

commit_title.description: Title for the automatic commit message

commit_message.description: Extra detail to append to automatic commit message

create_pull_request_review.description: Create a review for a pull request

body.description: The body text of the review

comments.description: Comments to leave as part of the review

path.description: The relative path to the file to comment on

position.description: The position in the diff to comment on

description.description: A short description of the repository

auto_init.description: Whether to create an initial commit with empty README

org.description: The organization to create the repository under (if not provided, creates in user's account)

list_workflows.description: List GitHub Actions workflows for a repository

workflow_id.description: The ID or file name of the workflow

create_branch.description: Create a new branch in a repository

sha.description: The SHA of the commit to create the branch from

head.description: The name of the branch where your changes are implemented

base.description: The name of the branch you want your changes pulled into

body.description: The body text of the pull request

draft.description: Whether to create the pull request as a draft

maintainer_can_modify.description: Whether maintainers can modify the pull request

number.description: Number uniquely identifying the pull request within its repository.

title.description: The title of the pull request.

state.description: State of this Pull Request. Either `open` or `closed`.

draft.description: Indicates whether or not the pull request is a draft.

diff_branch_to_branch.description: Diffs a branch to another branch, showing commits and changed files.

base_branch.description: The base branch for the comparison

head_branch.description: The head branch for the comparison

ahead_by.description: Number of commits the head branch is ahead of the base branch

behind_by.description: Number of commits the head branch is behind the base branch

total_commits.description: Total number of commits in the comparison
